org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood

Class LazyMaxLikelihoodMPE

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
        • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood.VotedPerceptron
          • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood.LazyMaxLikelihoodMPE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class LazyMaxLikelihoodMPE
extends VotedPerceptron
    Voted perceptron algorithm that does not require a ground model of pre-specified dimensionality.

    For the gradient of the objective, the expected total incompatibility is computed by finding the MPE state.

    Note that this class does not support latent variables but will not throw an error if the labelDB does not include a corresponding label for a RandomVariableAtom. All unspecified labels will set to their most probable values conditioned on the observations in distributionDB and the labels in labelDB.

    Author:
    Stephen Bach
